# Node modules
node_modules/

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*

# Dependency directories
bower_components/

# Environment files
.env

# Dist and build files
dist/
build/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE-specific files
.vscode/
.idea/

# Package lock files (optional)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Coverage directory
coverage/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.swp
*.bak

# Specific custom files
your-custom-files-or-folders/
